sdgGoals.title: No Poverty
sdgGoals.description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

sdgGoals.title: Zero Hunger
sdgGoals.description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

sdgGoals.title: Good Health and Well-being
sdgGoals.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

sdgGoals.title: Quality Education
sdgGoals.description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

sdgGoals.title: Gender Equality
sdgGoals.description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

sdgGoals.title: Clean Water and Sanitation
sdgGoals.description: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

sdgGoals.title: Affordable and Clean Energy
sdgGoals.description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

sdgGoals.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
sdgGoals.description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

sdgGoals.title: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
sdgGoals.description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

sdgGoals.title: Reduced Inequalities
sdgGoals.description: Reduce inequality within and among countries

sdgGoals.title: Sustainable Cities and Communities
sdgGoals.description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

sdgGoals.title: Responsible Consumption and Production
sdgGoals.description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

sdgGoals.title: Climate Action
sdgGoals.description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

sdgGoals.title: Life Below Water
sdgGoals.description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

sdgGoals.title: Life on Land
sdgGoals.description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems

sdgGoals.title: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions
sdgGoals.description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development

sdgGoals.title: Partnerships for the Goals
sdgGoals.description: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
